title: Estee Lauder Beautiful Magnolia Eau De Parfum Spray - 1.7-oz
features: A hypnotic floral and green eau de parfum with notes that draw you deep into a love story, from beginning to end.
The emotional rush of the magnolia, a symbol of loyalty in love, is balanced with crisp herbaceous maté and water lotus, as fresh as new love itself.
A hypnotic blend with signature notes of lush Magnolia, solar Gardenia, warm Woods, and luminous Musk. Romantic, feminine, and radiant.
For better results spray on pulse points to surround yourself with this hypnotic blend.
Lauder Beautiful Magnolia Eau De Parfum Spray is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women.
description: Dare to love. A hypnotic blend with signature notes of lush Magnolia, solar Gardenia, warm Woods and luminous Musk. Romantic, feminine and radiant. Notes: Each note draws you deeper into a love story, from beginning to end. Dare to Dream: Magnolia Petals, Maté, Water Lotus The lightning bolt moment you saw each other for the first time. A sensation like no other. The emotional rush of the magnolia, a symbol of loyalty in love, is balanced with crisp herbaceous Maté and the lush transparency of Water Lotus, as fresh as new love itself. Dare to Desire: Magnolia Oil, Solar Gardenia, Turkish Rose The swirl of contradictory feelings, an explosion of passion, are reflected in the hypnotic nectar-like scent of Magnolia Oil, sensuous and feminine, irresistibly swept away by dazzling notes of Solar Gardenia and deep Turkish Rose.
